abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Yahya A. Alyahya
            at the meeting of March 30, 2000 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, the Fiscal and Administrative Reform
            Special Sector Adjustment Loan, and the Social Security
            Special Sector Adjustment Loan for Brazil.
